text: Muricauda lutimaris is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Muricauda which has been isolated from tidal flat from the Yellow Sea in Korea. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Muricauda lutimaris at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * * Category:Flavobacteria Category:Bacteria described in 2008
title: Muricauda lutimaris
